short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension deletes hateful slurs from the texts of the browsed pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to delete ethnic, gender and disability slurs in English and Italian from your Google Chrome researches.

For any info, feedback or suggestions feel free to contact me at pierpylucidi@gmail.com.
